prerequisites: At least one drive with 10GB+ free space
USB drive (optional, for External drive testing)

test_1_uninstaller_list_mode.description: Test uninstaller detection without actually removing anything
expected_results: Should detect existing F:\ installation (AI_Environment + AI_Lab)
test_1_uninstaller_list_mode.success_criteria: Lists all installations correctly without errors

test_2_uninstaller_dry_run.description: Test uninstaller plan creation without actually removing anything
test_2_uninstaller_dry_run.success_criteria: Shows correct removal plan without executing it

test_3_fresh_install_internal.description: Full fresh installation to Internal drive (C:\ or D:\)

expected_behavior.status_file: master_installation_status.json should show both components completed

test_3_fresh_install_internal.success_criteria: Both components installed successfully at root level (side-by-side)
test_3_fresh_install_internal.skip_if: No available Internal drive with 10GB+ free space

test_4_uninstall_internal.description: Test uninstaller on Internal drive side-by-side installation

expected_behavior.detection: Should detect both AI_Environment and AI_Lab at root

test_4_uninstall_internal.success_criteria: Both components removed cleanly, no leftover directories

test_5_fresh_install_external.description: Full fresh installation to External drive (USB)
steps: 1. Plug in USB drive (note drive letter)

test_6_uninstall_external_nested.description: Test uninstaller on External drive nested installation

expected_behavior.detection: Should detect nested installation (AI_Environment inside AI_Lab)

test_6_uninstall_external_nested.success_criteria: Nested structure removed cleanly in correct order

test_7_resume_functionality.description: Test resume functionality with interrupted installation
steps: 4. During AI_Environment installation, press Ctrl+C to interrupt

expected_behavior.interruption: Installation should be marked as 'processing' in status
expected_behavior.detection: Menu option 4 should be available and functional
expected_behavior.resume: Should continue from last completed step

test_7_resume_functionality.notes: This test requires manual interruption - may need multiple attempts

recommended_test_order: Test 3: Fresh Install Internal (creates side-by-side installation)
Test 5: Fresh Install External (creates nested installation) [if USB available]
Test 6: Uninstall External (tests nested removal) [if USB available]
